list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a part of a tree which grows out from the trunk or from a bough.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Sophie was in the branches of a tree eating an apple
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Sophie đang ở trong cành cây đang ăn một quả táo

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a road or path) divide into one or more subdivisions.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: follow this track south until it branches into two
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Theo dõi theo dõi phía nam này cho đến khi nó phân nhánh thành hai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a tree or plant) bear or send out branches.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this rose has a tendency to branch and spread at the top
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hoa hồng này có xu hướng nhánh và lan rộng ở trên cùng
